i18n.title: Polka Dot Background Pattern
i18n.description: In this lab, we will explore the basics of CSS programming and learn how to use CSS to style and format web pages. Through a series of hands-on exercises, you will gain a solid understanding of CSS syntax, selectors, properties, and values, and be able to create visually appealing and responsive web pages. By the end of this lab, you will have a strong foundation in CSS and be ready to take on more advanced web development projects.
